name: fitnessapp
description: Testing assigments for Backend developer interview

scripts.start: cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r ts-node/register src/index.ts
scripts.dev: cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true nodemon -r ts-node/register src/index.ts
scripts.seed: cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r ts-node/register src/seed.ts

author: richard.solar@goodrequest.com
